titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the Vatican should recognize the State of Israel and should establish diplomatic relations with that country.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.

bill.summary: 2/2/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Vatican should grant recognition to and establish diplomatic relations with Israel.
